100.description: Buttons, navigation, and text not meant to break over a line

115.description: Headings, introductory (lead or dek) text, no more than 1-2 sentences

135.description: Short text (under 1 paragraph), captions, text with a very short or very long measure

150.description: Short (1-2 paragraphs) of running text, especially with a short measure

162.description: A good choice for most reading text, especially text meant for extended reading

175.description: Shorter text (1-2 paragraphs) meant to be distinguished from other page text, pullquotes
